00031    IntraStructureFactor::IntraStructureFactor(System& system) 
00032     : SystemDiagnostic<System>(system),
00033       isInitialized_(false)
00034    {}
00035 
00037    void IntraStructureFactor::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00038    {
00039 
00040       // Read interval and parameters for AutoCorrArray
00041       readInterval(in);
00042       readOutputFileName(in);
00043 
00044       nAtomType_ = system().simulation().nAtomType();
00045 
00046       read<int>(in, "speciesId", speciesId_);
00047       read<int>(in, "nAtomTypeIdPair", nAtomTypeIdPair_);
00048       atomTypeIdPairs_.allocate(nAtomTypeIdPair_);
00049       readDArray< Pair<int> >(in, "atomTypeIdPairs", atomTypeIdPairs_, 
00050                                                      nAtomTypeIdPair_);
00051 
00052       read<int>(in, "nWave", nWave_);
00053       waveIntVectors_.allocate(nWave_);
00054       readDArray<IntVector>(in, "waveIntVectors", waveIntVectors_, nWave_);
00055 
00056       waveVectors_.allocate(nWave_);
00057       fourierModes_.allocate(nWave_, nAtomType_ + 1);
00058       structureFactors_.allocate(nWave_, nAtomTypeIdPair_);
00059 
00060       isInitialized_ = true; 
00061    }
00062 
00063    /*
00064    * Set up before simulation.
00065    */
00066    void IntraStructureFactor::setup() 
00067    {
00068       if (!isInitialized_) 
00069          UTIL_THROW("Object is not initialized");
00070       assert (nWave_ > 0);
00071       assert (nAtomTypeIdPair_ > 0);
00072 
00073       // Clear accumulators
00074       int i, j;
00075       for (i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00076          for (j = 0; j < nAtomTypeIdPair_; ++j) {
00077             structureFactors_(i, j) = 0.0;
00078          }
00079       }
00080       nSample_ = 0;
00081    }
00082 
00083    /* 
00084    * Increment Structure Factor
00085    */
00086    void IntraStructureFactor::sample(long iStep) 
00087    {
00088       if (isAtInterval(iStep))  {
00089 
00090          Vector  position;
00091          std::complex<double> rho[2];
00092          std::complex<double> expFactor;
00093          double  volume = system().boundary().volume();
00094          double  product, dS;
00095          System::ConstMoleculeIterator molIter;
00096          Molecule::ConstAtomIterator   atomIter;
00097          int  typeId, i, j, k;
00098 
00099          makeWaveVectors();
00100 
00101          // Loop over molecules in species
00102          system().begin(speciesId_, molIter); 
00103          for ( ; molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00104 
00105             // Set all Fourier modes to zero
00106             for (i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00107                for (typeId = 0; typeId <= nAtomType_; ++typeId) {
00108                   fourierModes_(i, typeId) = 0;
00109                }
00110             }
00111  
00112             // Loop over all atoms in one molecule
00113             molIter->begin(atomIter); 
00114             for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00115                position = atomIter->position();
00116                typeId   = atomIter->typeId();
00117  
00118                // Loop over wavevectors
00119                for (i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00120                   product = position.dot(waveVectors_[i]);
00121                   expFactor = exp( product*Constants::Im );
00122                   fourierModes_(i, typeId)     += expFactor;
00123                   fourierModes_(i, nAtomType_) += expFactor;
00124                }
00125   
00126             }
00127 
00128             // Increment structure factors
00129             for (i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00130                for (j = 0; j < nAtomTypeIdPair_; ++j) {
00131                   for (k = 0; k < 2; ++k) {
00132                      typeId = atomTypeIdPairs_[j][k];
00133                      if (typeId >= 0) {
00134                         rho[k] = fourierModes_(i, typeId);
00135                      } else {
00136                         rho[k] = fourierModes_(i, nAtomType_);
00137                      }
00138                   }
00139                   rho[0] = std::conj(rho[0]);
00140                   dS = std::real(rho[0]*rho[1])/volume;
00141                   structureFactors_(i, j) += dS;
00142                }
00143             }
00144 
00145          }
00146 
00147          ++nSample_;
00148       }
00149 
00150    }
00151 
00155    void IntraStructureFactor::makeWaveVectors() 
00156    {
00157       Vector    dWave;
00158       Boundary* boundaryPtr = &system().boundary();
00159       int       i, j;
00160 
00161       // Calculate wavevectors
00162       for (i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00163          waveVectors_[i] = Vector::Zero;
00164          for (j = 0; j < Dimension; ++j) {
00165             dWave  = boundaryPtr->reciprocalBasisVector(j);
00166             dWave *= waveIntVectors_[i][j];
00167             waveVectors_[i] += dWave;
00168             //std::cout << waveVectors_[i] << std::endl;
00169          }
00170       }
00171    }
00172 
00173    void IntraStructureFactor::output() 
00174    {
00175       double      value;
00176       int         i, j, k;
00177 
00178       // Echo parameters to a log file
00179       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(), outputFile_);
00180       writeParam(outputFile_); 
00181       outputFile_.close();
00182 
00183       // Output structure factors to one file
00184       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".dat"), outputFile_);
00185       for (i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00186          for (k = 0; k < Dimension; ++k) {
00187             outputFile_ << Int(waveIntVectors_[i][k], 5);
00188          }
00189          outputFile_ << Dbl(waveVectors_[i].abs(), 20, 8);
00190          for (j = 0; j < nAtomTypeIdPair_; ++j) {
00191             value = structureFactors_(i, j)/double(nSample_);
00192             outputFile_ << Dbl(value, 18, 8);
00193          }
00194          outputFile_ << std::endl;
00195       }
00196       outputFile_.close();
00197 
00198    }

00203    void IntraStructureFactor::save(Serializable::OArchiveType& ar)
00204    { ar & *this; }

00209    void IntraStructureFactor::load(Serializable::IArchiveType& ar)
00210    { ar & *this; }
